amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to enforce certain final Clean Power Plan rules.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 135 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds to enforce certain final Clean Power Plan rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 240 (Roll no. 381).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
